SEARCH
Package com.example

Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
com.example.BankAccount
public class BankAccount extends Object
Represents a bank account with basic operations: deposit, withdraw, apply interest, and track a transaction history.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankAccount(String name, double initialBalance)
    Creates a bank account with a given name and initial balance.

  • Constructor Details

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount(String name, double initialBalance)
      Creates a bank account with a given name and initial balance.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the account holder (non-null and non-empty).
      initialBalance - The initial balance (must be >= 0).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is invalid or balance is negative.

  • Method Details

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      Deposits an amount into the account.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to deposit (must be > 0).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount <= 0.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraws an amount from the account.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to withdraw (must be > 0 and <= current balance).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount <= 0 or amount > current balance.

    • applyInterest

      public void applyInterest()
      Applies the default interest rate to the current balance. If the interest rate is negative, no interest is applied.

    • applyRandomBonus

      public void applyRandomBonus()
      Gives a random bonus to the account. The bonus is a random integer between 1 and 1000.

    • getTransactionHistory

      public List<String> getTransactionHistory()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of transaction history entries.
      Returns:
      A list of transaction strings.

    • closeAccount

      public void closeAccount()
      Closes the account, setting balance to zero and adding a transaction note.

    • setHolderName

      public void setHolderName(String newHolder)
      Changes the account holder name.
      Parameters:
      newHolder - The new holder name (non-null, non-empty).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newHolder is invalid

    • getHolderName

      public String getHolderName()
      Retrieves the name of the account holder.
      Returns:
      the name of the account holder.

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Retrieves the current balance of the bank account.
      Returns:
      the current balance as a double.

    • getDefaultInterestRate

      public static double getDefaultInterestRate()
      Returns the default interest rate for bank accounts.
      Returns:
      the default interest rate as a double.

    • setDefaultInterestRate

      public static void setDefaultInterestRate(double rate)
      Sets the default interest rate to be applied to all accounts.
      Parameters:
      rate - The new rate (must be >= 0).

    • getGlobalBankName

      public static String getGlobalBankName()
      Retrieves the global bank name.
      Returns:
      the global bank name as a String.

    • setGlobalBankName

      public static void setGlobalBankName(String globalBankNameParam)
      Sets the global bank name.
      Parameters:
      globalBankNameParam - the name of the global bank to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bank name is null or empty
